attributes.action: Make pensioners exempt from paying income tax on pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you consider that this is one of the richest economies in the world and that there are many people who fought for this country, and thus enabled following generations to enjoy the good life today, should we not be treating those people better, showing our appreciation for what they endured and giving them the good life in old age? Pensioners in this country are treated very poorly, time we showed some appreciation!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
